explains: v. 推断，推论；暗示，暗指

sentences.en: What can we infer about the author from the text?
sentences.cn: 从文章中我们能推断出作者的什么信息？

sentences.en: You should learn how to infer a conclusion from statistics.
sentences.cn: 你应该学会如何从数据中推断出一个结论。

sentences.en: Part of the ability is that they can infer what others know.
sentences.cn: 其中有部分能力是可以推断出其他人知道些什么。
